summary: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.
cast: Anna Kendrick|Justin Timberlake|Zooey Deschanel|Christopher Mintz-Plasse|Christine Baranski|Russell Brand|Gwen Stefani|John Cleese|James Corden|Jeffrey Tambor|Ron Funches|Aino Jawo|Caroline Hjelt|Kunal Nayyar|Quvenzhané Wallis|Walt Dohrn|Rhys Darby|Ricky Dillon|Meg DeAngelis|GloZell Green|Kandee Johnson|Grace Helbig|Curtis Stone|Mike Mitchell|Iris Dorhn|Liam Henry|Nina Zoe Bakshi|Zoë Crawford|Riley Crawford|Ollie Mitchell|Emmett Mitchell|Phoebe Dohrn|Susanna Reid
title: Trolls
